official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require certain disclosures at the time of the initial application.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require that credit card issuers disclose certain information on initial applications regarding interest rates and annual fees. Requires the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to monitor such disclosures.
